title: Amazon | SDE1 | India | 2024
content:
Education: B.Tech from IIIT Lucknow in Computer Science (2023 grad)
Years of Experience: 8 months (Full time experience)
Prior Experience: Interned at Amazon (6 months)
Date of the Offer: April 2024
Company: Amazon
Title/Level: Software Development Engineer 1 (SDE-1)
Location: Bengaluru, India
Salary: INR 19,17,000
Relocation: INR 1,50,000
Signing Bonus: INR 6,47,000 (1st year)
Stock bonus: INR 15,56,000 (over 4 years) (5% in 1st year)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock)(1st year): ~ INR 26,41,800 (excluding relocation)
Benefits: Total 15 annual leaves, 12 casual leaves, 12 sick leaves + Medical Insaurance upto INR 5,00,000

title: ISS (Institutional Shareholder Services) | Junior Analyst | Mumbai
content:
* **Education:** B.Tech from private engineering college
* **Years of Experience:** Fresher
* **Prior Experience:** 6 months intern at same company
* **Date of the Offer:** July 2024 (On campus)
* **Company:** ISS (Institutional Shareholder Services)
* **Title/Level:** Junior Analyst
* **Location:** Mumbai, India
* **Base Salary:** INR 12,00,000
* **Relocation bonus (One time):** INR 45,000
* **Total comp:** 12(Base) + 1(PF + Gratuity) = 13LPA

title: Microsoft | L60 | Negotiation
content:
Education: B-Tech
Years of Experience: 1.7 years
Prior TC: 27 Lakhs + ESOPs
Date of the Offer: March 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: L60
Location: India
Base salary: 24 Lakhs INR
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 5L Signing Bonus (3L first year + 2L second year)
Stock bonus: 60000 USD vested 25% each year for 4 years
Bonus: 0% to 20% per year of Base Salary (10% on an average is what you usually get)
Total comp: ~ 42 Lakhs 1st Year
I feel this is a lowball because my previous fixed is 25 L. What are your views?

title: NetApp | MTS-2 | Bangalore
content:
Education: M.Tech CSE
Offer Type : on-campus
Years of Experience: fresher
Company: NetApp
Title/Level: Member of Technical Staff 2
Location: Bangalore
Base Salary: 17.6 LPA
Stock bonus: 350 units, vested over 3 years
Bonus: 1.5 LPA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): do it urself
